# material

**Instance Property**

The material shown by the visual effect view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var material: NSVisualEffectView.Material { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSVisualEffectView/Material-swift.enum/appearanceBased]; the material updates to the correct material based on the appearance set on this view.

## Specifying the Background Material

- **NSVisualEffectView.Material**: Constants to specify the material shown by the visual effect view.
